problem.markdown:
1. Coupled wheel of locomotive is an inversion of
() Six bar mechanism () Slider crank mechanism (x) Four bar mechanism () Double slider crank mechanism
2. Which of these gives a perfect straight line motion?
(x) Hart's Inversor () Modified Scott Russel Mechanism () Watt's straight line linkage () None of these
3. Which of the following is the inversion of four bar chain?
(x) Beam engine () Pendulum pump () Oscillating cylinder () None of these
4. Watts indicator is an inversion of
() Six bar mechanism () Double slider crank mechanism () Slider crank mechanism (x) Four bar mechanism
5. The links in a four bar mechanism is ?
(x) Binary link () Flexible link () None of these () Ternary link
problem.p: 1. Coupled wheel of locomotive is an inversion of
2. Which of these gives a perfect straight line motion?
3. Which of the following is the inversion of four bar chain?
